data.title: Netflix amends Warner Bros deal to all cash in bidding war
data.description: Netflix has shifted to an all-cash bid, removing its stock component.
data.content:
The new terms neutralise one of the primary criticisms from Paramount that the stock portion of the Netflix offer makes its bid inferior.

data.author: htan@insider.com (Huileng Tan)
data.title: Why Goldman Sachs raised its gold price forecast 10%
data.description: Goldman Sachs raises its December 2026 gold price forecast to $5,400 per ounce, citing strong private sector demand and central bank buying trends.
data.content:
Goldman Sachs has hiked its gold price forecast by 10% on the back of blistering private-sector demand for the precious metal.

data.title: Brett Kavanaugh says letting Trump fire Lisa Cook ‘would weaken, if not shatter, the independence of the Federal Reserve’
data.description: Both Cook and Federal Reserve chairman Jerome Powell sat through nearly two hours of arguments in the packed courtroom.

data.author: Stan Choe, The Associated Press
data.title: Trump TACO trade roars as stocks recover half of yesterday’s loss after messages over ‘piece of ice’ from Davos
data.description: Trump has a history of big threats that send financial markets sliding, only to pull back later and reach deals that are seen as less bad for the economy.
